title: Kaichou-sama no Oose no Mama ni
original_name: 会長サマの仰せのままに
sinopse:
1. Kaichou-sama no Oose no Mama ni (At the Command of the Student Council President)
   2-3. Shoki-sama to Pet: Manatsu no Kimi wa Doku wo Motsu (Mr. Secretary and His Pet: A Poisonous Summer)
   4-5. Soredewa Sensei, Biyaku wo Douzo. (Here, Mr. Kojo, an Aphrodisiac.)
2. Mafuyu no Boku wa Doku ni Oboreru
